name: Max Velocity
description:
Max Velocity is an ultra-fast dodge-em up where you must avoid all obstacles while flying through awesome environments!

Created in 8 weeks by first year students at the BUAS (formerly known as NHTV) The team: Design:
  • Sam Minh
  • Dean van den Boom
  • Norbert van Hamond
  • Nicole de Jong
Art:
  • Luca Kawe
  • Laura Bot
Programming:
  • Frank de Jong
  • Stefan Jägers

Max Velocity uses the Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere. Unreal® Engine, Copyright 1998 – 2018, Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved.
